page.title: 18HOLMESFIELD FAMILY LIFE
page.content: A nine year old girl living in Lidgate attends William Levick Primary School in Dronfield Woodhouse. She lives with her mother, father and brother. Her father works as an insurance broker in Sheffield. On school days she arises at 8.00.a.m. and leaves for school at 8.40. Her mother takes her to school but her brother goes by taxi and bus. On Monday, after school she plays netball with her friends and attends brownies at Holmesfield church. Tuesday evenings are 'J' Club at the church and Wednesday it is the school gym club which is followed by a dancing class at the church hall. Friday is the Roller Disco at Dronfield Civic Centre. Saturday is shopping day at the Dronfield Supermarket. Her pets are a cat ,which kills shrews and mice,a rabbit and a gerbil.
